casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Theodore PITTMAN, Jr. No. 694P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2005. Marilyn G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, for Theodore Pittman. Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of December 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed pending the determination of the State's Petition for Discretionary Review by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of December 2005."
